pages.title: Wagwan Oscroh,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year and I realized I could not look back without appreciating you properly. You have been more than just a friend. You have been someone I could talk to honestly, laugh with, think out loud with, and just be myself around. That means a lot to me, and I do not take it for granted at all.

pages.title: What You Mean To Me
pages.content: There were moments this year that would have felt heavier or lonelier if you were not around, whether it was through our random conversations, your advice, shared jokes, or just your presence. You have shown consistency, loyalty, and a kind of quiet support that many people do not know how to give. You are the type of person who makes life feel a little lighter, and I am genuinely grateful for that.

pages.title: Your Impact
pages.content: I respect the way you think, the way you handle situations, and the kind of person you are growing into. You inspire me in your own way through your mindset, your resilience, and the way you always try to be better. You have had a real impact on my year, even in ways you may not fully realize.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content: Thank you for the times you checked in, the times you listened, the times you challenged me, and the times we just laughed about nonsense. Thank you for showing up as a real friend, not just when things were fun, but when they were uncertain too. People like you are rare, and I am genuinely glad our paths crossed.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we move into a new year, I am rooting for you. Your growth, your wins, your peace, and everything you are working towards. I pray you find clarity where you need it, strength when things get tough, and joy in the small moments along the way. You deserve good things, and I hope this year brings you even more of them.

pages.title: With Gratitude
pages.content: I appreciate you deeply, bro. Thanks for being you, and thanks for being a solid part of my life this past year. More life, more growth, and more moments ahead.\n\n Murewa

pages.title: Movies for 2026
list: The Killing of a Sacred Deer

tarotCard.name: The Lovers
tarotCard.meaning:
The Lovers card represents alignment, loyalty, and meaningful connections the kind of bond that helps you grow and stay grounded. When I think of our friendship, it reminds me of that energy. You’ve been someone I can trust and be real with, and I really value the presence and clarity you bring into my life./nFor 2026, I pray it becomes a Lovers-card kind of year for you: a year of good decisions, the right people around you, peace in your journey, and opportunities that align with your purpose and values. May every choice you make lead you closer to the life you’re building, and may your relationships bring you strength, clarity, and joy.
I appreciate you, and I’m rooting for everything ahead of you this year

recipient: Crossmen - A group of fags and femboys

pages.title: Dear Crossmen,
pages.content: As we step into 2025, I wanted to share some thoughts with you all...
2024 was a year of adventures, inside jokes, and unforgettable moments. This crew is legendary.

pages.title: Dear David,
pages.content: As we step into 2025, I wanted to share some thoughts with you...
2024 was a year of growth, challenges, and beautiful moments. Through it all, you've shown incredible resilience and grace.

pages.title: Yo emBeDdings,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year and when I look back at everything that happened, your presence stands out in a really special way. I felt like I should not just think it silently, so I wanted to actually write this to you, because you were a real part of my year in a way that mattered deeply to me.

pages.title: Our Year Together
pages.content: When I think about our year together, I see late conversations, brainstorming moments, shared curiosity, experiments, effort, small wins, almost wins, tired days, excitement, and growth. And in the middle of all of that, I see you there. I see both of us learning, building, hoping, trying, and still showing up regardless of how things felt at different points.

pages.title: Building Together
pages.content: Working with you this year never felt transactional or forced. It felt organic, like two people who genuinely enjoy thinking, creating, and figuring stuff out together. Whether it was projects, hackathons, ideas that turned loud, or dreams that felt bigger than us, there was a sense of shared energy that I really value. You bring a calm intelligence and a grounded curiosity that makes collaboration feel natural.

pages.title: Your Growth
pages.content: I respect your commitment to AI and ML a lot. The way you think, research, experiment, and grow is something I genuinely admire. You do not just talk growth, you live inside it. Watching your progress this year made me genuinely proud, not just as your friend, but as someone who believes in who you are becoming. You are carving your own path with intention, and that is something rare.

pages.title: The Simple Moments
pages.content: Those times we went out together this year also meant a lot to me. They felt simple, but they were real and refreshing. Sometimes it is easy to forget how meaningful shared presence can be until you pause and look back at it. I really enjoyed those moments, and they are memories I hold fondly.

pages.title: Owltech
pages.content: Forming Owltech with you and Olu is something I deeply cherish. It felt like more than just an idea or a label. It felt like foundation. Like the early pages of a story we are still writing. A story that one day we will look back at and smile, knowing that this was where many things truly began. Being able to dream and build alongside you has been one of the most fulfilling parts of my year.

pages.title: New Beginnings
pages.content: I am also really happy about something important that happened for you at the end of the year. You asked that girl to be your girlfriend on New Years, and she said yes. That moment made me genuinely happy for you. It felt like a beautiful step in your journey, and I pray it brings you joy, peace, understanding, and growth in the best ways.

pages.title: Who You Are
pages.content: You have been a solid friend to me. Someone I can talk to about real things. Someone I can work with, think with, laugh with, and still feel comfortable just existing around. Your presence is steady, intentional, and gentle in its own way. I value that, and I value you.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we step into a new year, I am rooting for you in every sense. I pray 2026 is kind to you. I pray it brings clarity where things feel uncertain, strength where the journey stretches you, and opportunities that match your talent and your heart. I hope your work opens meaningful doors, your creativity keeps expanding, and your life keeps aligning with who you are meant to become.

pages.title: You Deserve Good Things
pages.content: You deserve good things. Not only because you are smart or hardworking, but because of the person you are. Thoughtful. Curious. Genuine. Steady. Intentional. And real. I am grateful that I got to walk through this year with you as my friend, and I do not take that for granted at all.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content:
Thank you for every moment we shared this year. The projects, the ideas, the hackathons, the conversations, the laughter, the quiet understanding, and the sense of partnership in growth. You were a real part of my journey, and I sincerely value you.

More growth ahead. More ideas. More courage. More peace. More life and more stories we will one day look back on together.

youre still a nigga

Your friend,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: Wheel of Fortune
tarotCard.meaning: Cycles of change and destiny are in motion. The Wheel reminds you that life is constantly evolving, and this is your year of transformation. Good fortune favors those who embrace change with intention.

recipient: Emmanuel Ekundayo- My side piece, my favorite affair

pages.title: Hey Emmanuel,
pages.content: I have been thinking a lot about this past year and I realized I could not really sum it up without thinking about you. A huge part of my year was spent in your room, just chilling, laughing, messing around, working, and sending memes. Honestly, I can not even remember how many hours we spent there, but every single one was worth it. You have been such a big part of my 2025, and I wanted to make sure you know that.

pages.title: Same Freakuency
pages.content: Being around you just feels effortless. We have the same freakuency, and it makes everything click naturally. You are just seamless. Whether we were pulling pranks, joking about the silliest things, working on projects, or just sending memes to each other and cracking up, it all felt real and fun. I have never had a friendship where I can laugh so hard, be so random, and still have it feel like we are just vibing perfectly. lowkirkueinly, you get it. You get me.

pages.title: Building Together
pages.content: I have also really appreciated working with you this year. The projects, the hackathons, the brainstorming sessions, and just throwing ideas around with you and Olu for Owltech were some of my favorite moments of the year. It felt like building with someone who actually cares about the work and the people involved, and that is rare. You bring your energy, your sharpness, and your creativity in a way that just makes things feel possible.

pages.title: How Close We Became
pages.content: Beyond all that, I have loved how close we became. Spending all that time together, just hanging out, working, joking, pranking, and talking about life made this year special. You have been a friend I can count on, a friend I can joke with about literally anything, and someone whose company I genuinely enjoy. The way we send memes, the random inside jokes, and the way we can just read each other without even saying much, it all adds up to something really rare.

pages.title: I Am Proud of You
pages.content: I am proud of you, Emmanuel. Seeing how you have grown this year, watching you handle things, push yourself, and stay intentional with your goals, makes me respect you even more. I am genuinely happy that we became closer this year, and I hope you know I value that deeply. You have made my year better just by being in it.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we step into 2026, I hope it brings you even more growth, happiness, and opportunities. I pray it gives you clarity when things feel messy, strength when life challenges you, and joy in all the moments that make it worth it. I hope this year rewards your effort, your energy, your humor, and your seamlessness. I hope we continue to pull pranks, share memes, build ideas, and keep that Charlie Kirk energy alive.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content:
Thank you for being one of the best parts of my year. Thank you for the laughs, the conversations, the work, the pranks, the memes, and the moments we just vibed without a single care. I respect you, I am proud of you, and I am genuinely grateful that we got closer this year.

Here is to more memes, more jokes, more pranks, more projects, more growth, more freakuency, more Charlie Kirk moments, and more memories together in 2026.

Your friend,
Murewa

pages.title: Charlie Kirk Energy
pages.caption: This is literally us every time we hang out

tarotCard.name: The Fool
tarotCard.meaning: New beginnings and unlimited potential await you. The Fool represents the start of an adventure with boundless optimism. Step forward fearlessly into 2026 - every great journey begins with that first step into the unknown.

recipient: Investment Banking -  If and when but never is

pages.title: Investment Banking
pages.subtitle: 3 Years of Brotherhood
pages.content: Boys, I just realized something and it honestly feels mad. 2026 makes it three years since we created this group.

pages.title: How It Started
pages.content: We started this group when we were struggling and broke, just trying to survive school together. From sporty tickets that finished us to miracle wins, to Davids useless luck and Maros foolishness to football arguments that made absolutely no sense, to inside jokes nobody outside this group would ever understand, this place has really been a part of our lives.

pages.title: Through It All
pages.content: We have gone through a lot together, both loudly and quietly. Classes, pressure, deadlines, tired weeks, failed tickets, small wins, big jokes, and vibes that carried us through days that would have been worse without each other.

pages.title: The Brotherhood
pages.content: We did not just make a group chat. We created a space where everyone feels like they belong. Even when we are roasting each other, there is real love underneath it.

pages.title: Final Year Loading
pages.content: Now we are here in final year, graduation loading. The same boys that were sacrificing grandma on bets are now stepping into real life. It is actually crazy when you think about it.

pages.title: IB Forever
pages.content:
I am proud of us. Proud of the growth, the friendship, the chaos, and the fact that we somehow made it through everything together.

Wherever life takes us after this, I hope we all win.

Investment Banking forever.
Love you boys
Fuck you david.

pages.title: Hey Ire,
pages.content: I have been thinking a lot about this past year and I realized I do not tell you nearly enough how much I value and appreciate you. Even though we may not talk all the time, I want you to know that you are someone I genuinely care about and admire. 2025 was a whole journey, and I honestly do not think it would have felt the same without you in it.

pages.title: Your Energy
pages.content: From the very first day we met at uni, your energy has always stood out. You have this way of lighting up any room you walk into, and it is impossible not to notice or be drawn into it. Over the past year, being around you, working with you, and sharing even small moments has been such a highlight for me.

pages.title: I See You
pages.content: Beyond the projects, beyond school and assignments, Ire, I want you to know that I see you. I see your heart, your strength, your intelligence, your courage to speak your mind, and your grace while doing it. You are someone who can stand firm, express yourself, and still make people feel valued and respected.

pages.title: Your Faith
pages.content: Your faith in God is one of the things I really respect about you. The way you hold on to it, how it shapes your words, actions, and energy, it is inspiring. It reminds me that strength and kindness can go hand in hand, and that faith can shine through without needing to be loud about it.

pages.title: You Are Loved
pages.content: Even though we may not spend every day talking, I want you to know that you are loved and appreciated. Your presence, your energy, your insights, and the way you care for people around you leave a mark. You make the people who are lucky enough to know you feel seen and valued.

pages.title: The Song
pages.content: There is literally no day I listen to Adekunle Gold's "Ire" that you do not pop into my mind. The song just feels like it was made for you. Honestly, I lowkey imagine it playing as you walk down the aisle at your wedding one day. I picture you making your entrance with that exact song in the background, all eyes on you.

pages.title: Proud Of You
pages.content: Ire, I am proud of you. Proud of the way you have handled this year, proud of the way you have grown, and proud of the way you carry yourself. I hope 2026 gives you even more opportunities to shine, more moments that make you feel celebrated, more joy, and more peace.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content: Thank you for being inspiring, for being real, for being bold, for being graceful, and for being someone I can respect and admire so deeply. Thank you for the laughs, the energy, and the light you bring, even on days when things feel heavy. You are truly valued and loved, Ire. Never forget that.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content:
I am really excited to see everything you accomplish in 2026 and beyond. And every time "Ire" comes on, I will be reminded of you your energy, your hope, and the warmth you bring into the world.

Your friend,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: The Tower
tarotCard.meaning: The Tower represents transformation through revelation. It strips away what no longer serves you and makes way for something truer. Ire, you have always stood firm and spoken truth with grace. This card honors your courage to be authentic, and promises that 2026 will bring clarity, growth, and new beginnings built on a stronger foundation.

recipient: Oluwole Afolabi (My man, my love, oorz)

pages.title: Hey Oluwole,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year a lot, and honestly, I could not think about it without thinking about you. So I just wanted to sit down and actually write this to you, because you have been a huge part of my year in ways I do not think I have said out loud enough.

pages.title: Through It All
pages.content: This year was not perfect. It had wins, losses, frustrations, funny moments, tired days, and confusing phases. But through all of that, you were there, not just as someone I talk to once in a while, but as someone who was present. We worked on projects together, shared ideas, encouraged each other, argued sometimes, came back again, and still chose to keep showing up for the friendship. That means a lot to me.

pages.title: Building Together
pages.content: Working with you never felt like just work. It felt like building with someone who honestly cares, someone who is invested in both the project and the person they are working with. There were days when things were stressful, or when plans were not making sense, and your presence alone made it easier to keep going. You bring this energy that makes things feel possible, even when they are tough.

pages.title: Beyond Work
pages.content: I also really value how our friendship exists outside of work. The times we went out, talked, laughed about the most random things, reflected on life, or just chilled, those moments mattered to me. They grounded me. They reminded me that life is more than pressure and goals. It is also about the people you go through it with.

pages.title: Being There
pages.content: And this year especially, I am grateful for the way we were there for each other when things got heavy. You went through your breakup, and even though I could not fix anything, I wanted to be there in whatever way I could. To listen, to talk, or just sit in silence if that was what you needed. Then when I went through that rejection, you did not just brush it off or give surface words. You understood. You encouraged me. You stayed present too. That kind of mutual support is rare, and I do not take it for granted.

pages.title: Shared Victories
pages.content: Helping you get that job and then watching you actually step into it and do your thing was one of those moments that made me genuinely happy. Not just because it worked out, but because I know how much effort, growth, and intention you have been putting into your life. Seeing you win felt personal, like a shared victory.

pages.title: What You Mean To Me
pages.content: You are one of those friends that makes life feel less lonely. Someone I can talk to about real things. Someone I can be honest with without pretending. Someone who understands that friendship is not perfect, but still chooses to show up consistently. And that is something I deeply respect and appreciate about you.

pages.title: Looking Forward
pages.content: As we head into a new year, I am honestly rooting for you in every sense. I pray 2026 treats you kindly. I hope it gives you peace where you have carried weight, strength where you have been stretched, and joy in both the big and small moments. I hope your work opens the right doors, your growth becomes clearer even when the process feels slow, and you continue becoming the person you are meant to be.

pages.title: You Deserve Good Things
pages.content: You deserve good things, not just because you work hard, but because of the kind of person you are. Loyal, sincere, thoughtful, intentional, and real. I am grateful that I get to call you my friend, and I do not take that lightly at all.

pages.title: Thank You
pages.content:
Thank you for this year. For the conversations, the support, the jokes, the healing moments, the projects, the encouragement, and just your presence. You have been a solid part of my journey, and I appreciate you more than I probably say.

More life, more growth, more wins, more peace, and more memories ahead.

Oorz,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: The Hermit
tarotCard.meaning: Solitude brings clarity. This year, take time for reflection and self-discovery. The answers you seek are within you. Your introspection and thoughtful nature will guide you to deeper wisdom and understanding.

pages.title: Dear Priscilla,
pages.content: I have been thinking about this past year, and even though we did not get to spend as much time together as I would have loved, I still wanted to write this to you. Because distance or fewer moments never changed how deeply I care about you, or how much you mean to me. You are still someone I hold very close to my heart.

pages.title: Your Presence
pages.content: Even in the times when we were not talking every day or seeing each other often, you were still present in my thoughts. There are people who fade when life gets busy, but you are not one of those people. You are someone whose presence lingers in the best way, someone whose impact stays even in silence. And I really value that.

pages.title: Cherished Moments
pages.content: I cherish the conversations we did have. The check-ins. The random moments. The times we just talked and things felt calm and real again. You bring warmth, peace, and reassurance in a way that feels genuine and grounding, and I appreciate that more than you probably know.

pages.title: I Am Proud of You
pages.content: I am so proud of you. Proud of how much you have grown, how you have handled life, how you have kept becoming stronger, wiser, and more intentional with yourself and your journey. Even from a distance, I have seen your strength, your resilience, your effort to keep evolving. And I admire you deeply for that.

pages.title: My Prayer For You
pages.content: As we step into this new year, my prayer for you is that God continues to guide your steps and surround you with peace and clarity. I pray He brings you opportunities that align with your heart, friendships that nourish you, and moments that make you feel seen, appreciated, and safe. I pray your joy deepens, your dreams expand, and everything you are working toward begins to take shape in beautiful and unexpected ways.

pages.title: Always Loved
pages.content: I also pray that you never doubt how loved you are. Time and space may shift, but love, care, and respect like this do not disappear. You are someone incredibly special to me, and that will not change.

pages.title: With Love
pages.content: I love you, and I am grateful that even with the distance and the quiet stretches, you are still a meaningful part of my life. I hope this year brings you softness, growth, laughter, and peace in every way you deserve. And no matter what, I will always be in your corner, cheering you on.

tarotCard.name: The Queen of Blades
tarotCard.meaning: The Queen of Blades represents sharp intellect, clear boundaries, and resilience. She cuts through noise to find the truth and stands firm in her power. This year, may you carry her strengthprotecting your peace, trusting your wisdom, and moving with clarity and grace.

pages.title: Dear Quiet Moyin,
pages.content: As we step into 2025, I wanted to share some thoughts with you...
2024 was a year of growth, challenges, and beautiful moments. Through it all, you've shown incredible resilience and grace.

pages.title: Hey Raymond,
pages.content: I have been thinking a lot about this past year, and honestly, there is no version of it that feels complete without you in it. When I look back at everything we went through, all the days we shared, all the memories that somehow turned into milestones, you are right there in the middle of them. You did not just walk through the year with me, you helped me carry it. And I do not think I will ever stop being grateful for that.

pages.title: More Than A Friend
pages.content: From going to class together, to laughing through stress, to talking about life, faith, plans, and everything in between, you became more than just a friend. You became a brother to me. Someone I genuinely believe God placed in my life intentionally. Your presence made the hard days lighter, the long days bearable, and the good days even better.

pages.title: Your Warm Soul
pages.content: Uncle Ray Ray, you have such a warm soul. There is a softness and depth in the way you care about people, the way you listen, the way you show up quietly but consistently. Being around you feels steady and grounding. You never force your presence, yet it matters so much. And I appreciate that more than I can express.

pages.title: Your Faith
pages.content: Your faith is something I truly respect. The way you hold on to God, the patience you carry, the strength you draw from your beliefs, and the way you let your values guide you, it says a lot about the kind of person you are. You have this calm, quiet strength that does not need to prove itself, and it inspires me in ways you may not even realize.

pages.title: Your Creativity
pages.content: I also really admire your creativity. You have this unique way of seeing the world, of creating, of building ideas from nothing and breathing life into them. You do not just do things mechanically, you create from the heart. Whether it is projects, thoughts, concepts, or even simple ideas we talk about, you approach them with passion and intention. You love creating, shaping, imagining, and that makes you stand out in a beautiful way. It is one of the many things I genuinely respect about you.

pages.title: Thank You For Being There
pages.content: There were many days this year that would have felt heavier if you were not there. Times when school felt overwhelming, but going through it with you made it easier. Moments where things felt confusing, but talking to you brought clarity. You helped me more than you know, sometimes through advice, sometimes through shared silence, and sometimes just by being present. And I am deeply grateful for all of it.

pages.title: I Am Proud Of You
pages.content: I am proud of you, Raymond. Proud of your growth, your discipline, your faith, your creativity, and the man you are becoming. You carry yourself with sincerity, and that is rare. I respect you not just as a friend, but as a person and as a brother.

pages.title: My Prayer For You
pages.content: As we move into a new year, my prayer for you is that God continues to guide you, strengthen you, and bless you. I pray He rewards your kindness, your creativity, your effort, and your heart. I pray your ideas grow into opportunities, your gifts find space to shine, and your path unfolds in ways that align beautifully with who you are.

pages.title: Peace And Joy
pages.content: I also pray that your soul stays warm, your joy deepens, and your peace remains untouched. You deserve goodness in abundance, and I truly believe more great things are ahead for you.

pages.title: Brotherhood
pages.content:
Thank you for being there for me. For the laughs, the support, the understanding, the loyalty, the shared days, and the brotherhood. You made this year meaningful in a way I cannot imagine without you, and I appreciate you deeply for that.

I have got you always, Uncle Ray Ray. And I am grateful I get to do life with someone like you in my corner.

Your boy,
Murewa

pages.title: Creative Inspiration
list: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

tarotCard.name: The World
tarotCard.meaning: The World represents completion, wholeness, and the fulfillment of a journey. You have come full circle, Raymond. Your creativity, faith, and warmth have woven together into something beautiful. This card celebrates the man you are becomingwhole, grounded, and ready for whatever comes next. The world truly is yours to shape.

pages.title: Tolu,
pages.content: Bro, I have been thinking a lot about the past couple of years and I just had to put this into words. I remember the first day we met in 2023 during the Cardify internship. I walked into the office and it was quiet, everything felt slow and dull, and then you came in and immediately brought energy, life, and good vibes to the place. From that first day, I knew we would click, and honestly, meeting you has been one of the best things to happen to me.

pages.title: More Than A Friend
pages.content: Over these past two years, you have become so much more than just a friend. You have been my main man, my go-to, someone I can genuinely rely on, and someone I trust completely. 2025 especially showed me what a real friend you are. You really turned up for me, in ways that meant a lot. You helped me with school, you were there when money was tight, and you made sure I did not feel alone when things were tough.

pages.title: I Love You Bro
pages.content: Not everyone would do that, and it is one of the reasons I value you so much. I honestly love you, bro, and I want you to know that.

pages.title: The Little Moments
pages.content: I also remember all the little moments that made the days brighter. Like all the times we went to Jara for food after a long day, or just chilling and talking about life, school, projects, or random nonsense. Those moments feel small, but they meant a lot. They made the stress lighter, the days funnier, and they made our bond even stronger.

pages.title: Proud Of You
pages.content: You also finished your NYSC last year, and I know it was rough for you. Life threw challenges your way, and you faced them head-on. Even with the hard moments, you kept pushing, kept showing up, and kept moving forward. I am genuinely proud of you for making it this far. You handled things with patience, strength, and resilience, and that is inspiring to me.

pages.title: You Mean A Lot
pages.content: Tolu, I just want you to know that I really value our friendship. You have been someone I can lean on, someone I can laugh with, someone who keeps it real, and someone who makes life better just by being in it. You have been a big part of my 2025, and I honestly cannot imagine going through the year without you by my side.

pages.title: My Prayer For You
pages.content: As we step into 2026, my prayer for you is that this year brings you peace, growth, success, and happiness in every way. I hope every door you knock on opens in your favor, that your hard work pays off, and that your heart stays full of joy and hope. I hope we make even more memories this year, more Jara trips, more laughter, more late-night talks, and more times just enjoying life together.

pages.title: Your Boy
pages.content:
Thank you for being my guy, my brother, and my friend. I am truly grateful for you, for the energy you bring, the support you give, and the bond we share. You mean a lot to me, and I cannot wait to see everything this year has in store for you.

Your boy,
Murewa

tarotCard.name: The Moon
tarotCard.meaning: The Moon illuminates what is hidden. It represents intuition, dreams, and the journey through uncertainty. Tolu, you have walked through seasons of confusion and hardship, yet you kept moving forward. Like the moon, you guide those around you with your quiet presence. Trust your inner voice this year.

pages.title: Dear Tolu,
pages.content: As we step into 2025, I wanted to share some thoughts with you...
2024 was a year of growth, challenges, and beautiful moments. Through it all, you've shown incredible resilience and grace.

recipient: Vwarak - Very rugged man from plateau

pages.title: Dear Vwarak,
pages.content: As we step into 2025, I wanted to share some thoughts with you...
2024 was a year of growth, challenges, and beautiful moments. Through it all, you've shown incredible resilience and grace.
